name: Torps.github.io
tagline: GitHub Page for the Tor Path Simulator
body:
### The Tor Path Simulator (TorPS) TorPS quickly simulates path selection in [Tor](https://www.torproject.org/). The code can be obtained with `git clone https://github.com/torps/torps.git` TorPS was used to produce results for the paper
**Users Get Routed: Traffic Correlation on Tor by Realistic Adversaries**
_by [Aaron Johnson](http://www.ohmygodel.com/), Chris Wacek, [Rob Jansen](http://www-users.cs.umn.edu/~jansen/), [Micah Sherr](https://security.cs.georgetown.edu/~msherr/), and [Paul Syverson](http://www.syverson.org/)_
To appear in Proceedings of the 20th ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS 2013). For more information, contact: aaron.m.johnson AT nrl DOT navy DOT mil
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
